events.summary: Land grants distributed for western Granada conquests. 8% tax, 10-year reassessment. Foreign military aid arriving from multiple nations.

exchanges.text: Draft titles with 8% tax and 10-year reassessment.
Titles drafted. Foreign aid arrivals discussed.

events.summary: Juan meets Fra Angelico. Deep theological discussion about grace. Two-piece commission: wedding portrait and devotional piece for Isabel's chapel. They visit Isabel; she suggests 'God's light breaking through clouds.' Fra Angelico sketches Isabel and Catalina.

exchanges.text: I am eager to meet Fra Giovanni!
Deep discussion. Paintings conceptualized. Visit Isabel.

events.summary: Toledo Church Council convenes on Basel. Conservative clergy skeptical of conciliarism. Juan pushes for practical positions. Debate on papal authority and reform. Delegates to be selected.

exchanges.text: What is our position on Basel?
Conservative clergy debate. Positions begin forming.
